title: Todd Schoellman
text:
Todd Schoellman
Principal Research Economist
Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis
I work on macro-development. My main focus is on human capital and labor markets. I try to quantify the differences in skills and knowledge between workers in different countries; the role of countries, schools, and labor markets in generating these differences; and the implications of these differences for worker incomes and aggregate growth.
Email: todd.schoellman@gmail.com

title: Research
text: I work on macro-development with a primary focus on human capital and labor markets.
